Class AccessRoles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource

  • @Scope(value="request")
@Path(value="/{path: .*}/fcr:accessroles")
public class AccessRoles
extends org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
